context: Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. is a video game publisher focused on Grand Theft Auto, NBA 2K, and other AAA game franchises. Established 2K label. Hot Coffee controversy.

competitors.name: Electronic Arts
competitors.notes: Industry leader, dominated sports games with FIFA and Madden

competitors.name: Activision
competitors.notes: Major publisher, Call of Duty franchise growing

competitors.name: Ubisoft
competitors.notes: French publisher, Assassin's Creed in development

competitors.name: Sega
competitors.notes: Former console maker, now third-party publisher, Yakuza series began
